Sight reticles for M163 VADS

This package includes reticles for M61 reflex and M134 telescopic sights.

Reticle for M61 is drawn per 10-series TM; outer ring diameter is 60 mils, inner ring- 15mils, gap in inner ring is 3 mils wide.

M134 sight reticle is approximation based on pic from manual and size of it`s elements is my pure guess.

PACK FOR HIGH TIER US TANKS SIGHTS

Follow @Ometius93 for similar sights.

Pictures don't show all the sights.

Default sight improvements:


  • Made the main horizontal and vertical lines shorter to clear the sight up.
  • Removed the secondary range markings (200, 600, 1000, 1400, etc.) to have a clearer view of your target.
  • Moved the numbers to the other side to bring them closer to the ranging marks for ease of use.
  • Made the bar that moves when you adjust the sight range much shorter, but still large enough to easily see where it's sitting.
  • Moved the rangefinder information right next to the

Decided to pack all existing sights into one file, I will simply update the post and the file each time I make a new one.

Follow @TheGun31 for similar sights.

Pictures are for demonstration.


  • (21/06/18) Update:
  • Fixed rangefinder on all sights.
  • Remade Leopard 2K APFSDS/HEATFS sights (sight was moved to turret roof).
  • Added Leopard 2A4 (HEATFS) and Type 90 (HEATFS) sights.

  • (10/05/18) Update:
  • Added Panther G, Tiger 2 P, Charioteer (APCBC) and FV4202 (APCBC) sights.

  • (07/05/18) Update:
  • Started working on ATGM sights, will see how it goes.
  • Added Raketenjagdpanzer 2 HOT sight.

Last update: 05-06-2025 (total 382 vehicles)

Important:
All vehicules with laser rangefinder are not present in the pack: that diagonal pack is not adapted for supported the LR and automatic parallaxe correction.

I'm sorry for delay between updates, my work and my desire for the game is little less than a previous period. i continue progressively. Thank you for your support and your patience.

New vehicles added:
US: T1E1
FR: M46 (premium battlepass)

Fictional Sight for M50 Ontos

This is the new version of my personal sight for the "Thing". Upper rangefinder is calibrated to match the average sizes of soviet tanks. The rangefinder with german tanks size is missing for while and maybe will be introduced later. I made some improvements in visual, added a scale for .50 guns which is helpful on aiming distance and excluded the needing switch between sights for each kind of ammo.

Any suggestion leave it on comments. Hope you enjoy.
